quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and James Bond
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, officers, actor. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What creature is sent to kill James Bond in Dr. No?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tarantula

questions.question: In what Best Picture does Peter Lorre, playing a sniveling petty criminal, scream and beg Richard Blaine to save him, as the police arrest him in Blaine’s nightclub and drag him away for murdering two soldiers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Casablanca

questions.question: Dr. No is responsible for what evil deeds in the motion picture of the same name?

options.text: Turn U.S. gold reserve at Fort Knox radio-active
Make U.S. missiles crash in the Brazilian rain forest
Abduct English, Soviet and U.S.nuclear submarines

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Make U.S. missiles crash in the Brazilian rain forest

questions.question: Who created the character of James Bond?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ian Fleming

questions.question: James Bond is assigned what  weapon in the movie Dr. No?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Walther PPK

questions.question: In Cuba, the terminally ill Hyman Roth brings up the issue of Moe Green’s hit, telling Michael, I didnt ask who gave the order, because it had nothing to do with business! Which movie is this from?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Godfather II

questions.question: In the famous James Bond movie, what part of Dr. Nos body is prosthetic?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hand

questions.question: Ursula Andress portrayed what character in the motion picture Dr. No?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Honey Ryder

questions.question: Which director, known as the father of Bond films, directed the motion picture, Dr. No?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Terence Young

questions.question: In the movie Dr. No, the doctor heads what organization?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: S.P.E.C.T.R.E.

questions.question: Cast adrift with his loyal officers, the corpulent Captain swears vengeance and prophetically promises to see Christian hanged by the neck for his actions. Name this historically inaccurate Oscar winner.

options.text: All Quiet on the Western Front

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mutiny on the Bounty

questions.question: Sheen levels the AK-47 at the wounded Barnes, whom he knows is responsible for the death of Elias.  Barnes tells him in disgust to just “Do it!”, so he does, shooting Barnes three times in the chest. Name the movie this climactic scene is from.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Platoon

questions.question: What actor plays the villain in the movie Dr. No?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Joseph Wiseman

questions.question: Eric Liddell reassures his sister, who is fearful that he is neglecting his commitment to missionary work: “I believe that God made me for a purpose . . . but He also made me fast, and when I run, I feel His pleasure. What Best picture is this from?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chariots of Fire

questions.question: In spite of his friends’ objections, Earnest runs to the phone booth, preparing to give Clara a call, stating “Shes a dog. And Im a fat, ugly man. Well, all I know is I had a good time last night. Im gonna have a good time tonight. If we have enough good times together, Im gonna get down on my knees. Im gonna beg that girl to marry me!” Name this low-budget adaptation of a Paddy Chayefsky teleplay.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marty

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Song and Film
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, goldfinger, actor. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Dead Mans Party was a modest hit for this new wave band, known for their Halloween concerts and horror genre image which tended to be more off-beat than scary.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Oingo Boingo

questions.question: The song featured in the sound clip is Bark at the Moon, a 1983 recording by this artist who often incorporated elements of the horror genre in his music and stage presence.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ozzy Osbourne

questions.question: Although this film was still in the theaters when Empires movie poll was conducted, it still won 15th
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Dark Knight

questions.question: The Ramones recorded the title song to which Stephen King film?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pet Semetary

questions.question: In 1979, this band released a highly influential gothic rock single with the following lyrics:

options.text: one in a darkened room, The Count

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bauhaus

questions.question: With its vivid references to death, It would be hard to find a song more dark and haunting than the tune featured in the audio clip.  Which group recorded this hit back in 1976?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Blue Öyster Cult

questions.question: What is the villains evil goal in the motion picture, Goldfinger?

options.text: Make Fort Knoxs gold reserve radioactive
Steal the plans of a new weapons system
Brainwash the head of the Secret Service

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Make Fort Knoxs gold reserve radioactive

questions.question: The 1973 song Tubular Bells by Mike Oldfield was used for which of the following movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Exorcist

questions.question: Painted gold by Auric Goldfinger, the eponymous villain of the film Goldfinger, this female character’s death convinces her sister to take sides with 007.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jill Masterson

questions.question: James Bonds Aston Martin has what device, used against hostile passengers, in the motion picture, Goldfinger?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ejector seat

questions.question: This haunting song by Echo  the Bunnymen was used in the opening sequence in the cult classic, Donnie Darko.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Killing Moon

questions.question: What actor played the character of Goldfinger, in the motion picture of the same name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gert Frobe

questions.question: This artist began his 1978 hit featured in the audio clip with the opening line: I saw a werewolf with a Chinese menu in his hand walking through the streets of Soho in the rain. He was looking for the place called Lee Ho Fooks, going to get a big dish of beef chow mein.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Warren Zevon

questions.question: In the movie Goldfinger, James Bond hates this quartet, popular at the time the movie was produced.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Beatles

questions.question: Considered by many to be the successor to Edgar Allan Poe, this author of early 20th century supernatural tales has been an inspiration to many a musician.  The heavy metal band, Metallica, has recorded songs inspired by his works, and the prog rock band, Caravan, recorded the song Cthlu Thlu (1973) which was also inspired by his horror fiction (audio clip).
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: H. P. Lovecraft

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Thunderball and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, goldfinger, john. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the 1965 movie, Thunderball, how many atomic bombs are stolen from the jet fighter that disappears from radar?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Two

questions.question: In James Bonds Goldfinger, Oddjob uses what deadly weapon also used by John Steed in detective series The Avengers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hat

questions.question: John Barry wrote the music of the theme song for the James Bond movie Goldfinger. Which singer became famous for performing the song and sold more than a million copies of it in the USA alone?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shirley Bassey

questions.question: This street parade, seen in the 1965 film, Thunderball, helps Bond elude his pursuers.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Junkanoo

questions.question: In the motion picture, Goldfinger, the antagonist relies on this gas for accomplishing his goals.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Delta 9

questions.question: James Bond beats the villain at what game in the movie Goldfinger?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Golf

questions.question: In the 1965 movie, Thunderball, James Bond is sent to what city, to make contact with Domino?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nassau

questions.question: What is the name of Pussy Galores flying school in the motion picture Goldfinger?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Flying Circus

questions.question: In James Bonds Goldfinger, 007 knows the name of the villains plan, and this saves his life.  What was the name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Operation Grand Slam

questions.question: In James Bonds Thunderball, what means of communication does the British government use, to let the S.P.E.C.T.R.E. organization know that their terms are acceptable?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Big Ben

questions.question: How does the antagonist die in the movie Goldfinger?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sucked out of a window

questions.question: What actress played the character of Pussy Galore in the motion picture Goldfinger?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Honor Blackman

questions.question: What causes the death of MI6 agent, Paula Kaplan, in the motion picture, Thunderball?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cyanide capsule

questions.question: In the Bond movie, Thunderball, the villains yacht, called this, had a crucial part in S.P.E.C.T.R.E.s evil scheme.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Disco Volante

questions.question: In the motion picture, Thunderball, she befriends James Bond and puts him on the trail of  the villain, who happens to be her guardian.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Domino Derval

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Thunderball and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, maronie, jocko. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: As we learn during a meeting of S.P.E.C.T.R.E. agents, this is the villains codename in James Bonds, Thunderball.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Number 2

questions.question: What year was the movie Blazing Saddles released?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1974

questions.question: Where was Roman Maronie deported in the movie Johnny Dangerously?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sweden

questions.question: When James Bond is invited to play this sport, in 1965s, Thunderball, he remarks that he knows more about women, than about this sport.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shooting clay pigeons

questions.question: Which film has the following plot?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: American Beauty

questions.question: In the film Johnny Dangerously, what caliber was Danny Vermins pistol?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: .88 Magnum

questions.question: What British film director, born in Shanghai, China, directed three, including the first in the series of James Bond movies - Dr. No (1962), From Russia with Love (1963), and Thunderball (1965)?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Terence Young

questions.question: Who sang the theme song to 1965 James Bond movie, Thunderball?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tom Jones

questions.question: What comedian played Danny Vermin, a character form the comedy Johnny Dangerously?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Joe Piscopo

questions.question: In the motion picture, Thunderball, James Bond attends the fake funeral of this person.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jacques Bouvar

questions.question: In Johnny Dangerously, what did Johnny give his mother for her 29th birthday?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: an ashtray

questions.question: What color did Tommy paint Oliver Wendell Holmes in Johnny Dangerously?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Purple

questions.question: What was Johnnys real last name in the movie Johnny Dangerously?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kelly

questions.question: What former All-Pro linebacker appeared in the movie Johnny dangerously as Arthur?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dick Butkus

questions.question: What star of Everybody Loves Raymond played Jocko Dundee in Johnny Dangerously?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peter Boyle

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Blazing Saddles and Town
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, blazing, quote. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What was the name of the town featured in the movie Blazing Saddles?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rock Ridge

questions.question: Which film contains this Caroll-inspired quote?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Matrix

questions.question: Did Dom DeLuise have a role in the movie Blazing Saddles?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: Did Mel Brooks play more than one role in the movie Blazing Saddles?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: Which dictator appeared towards the end of the film Blazing Saddles?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Adolph Hitler

questions.question: Where did Sheriff Bart take off for at the end of the film Blazing Saddles?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nowhere Special

questions.question: Which film is the quote from?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Independence Day

questions.question: In Blazing Saddles, the township finds out that Hedley Lamarr has gathered a group of ruthless thugs to destroy the town. What idea did the sheriff come up with to save the town?

options.text: He rodes off into the sunset leaving the townsfolk to deal with the issue.
He asked Hedley Lamarr to stop.
He wanted to build a fake town

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He wanted to build a fake town

questions.question: In the movie Blazing Saddles, when Mongo comes to town, a man says to him You cant park that animal over there. Its illegal. What is Mongos next move?

options.text: He pulls the guy off the horse and proceeds to belt him up.
He punches the horse the man is sitting on.
He totally ignores the man and proceeds to smash up the saloon.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He punches the horse the man is sitting on.

questions.question: A human in which film delivered this ruthless line?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Aliens

questions.question: In the movie, Blazing Saddles, when the railroad goes through the town, Hedley Lamarr wants to drive the townspeople out of town. The following conversation takes place between Lamarr and his offsider, Taggart.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Number 6

questions.question: This movie character had a lot to say when he described the following:

options.text: James T. Kirk, Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Doctor, Doctor Who

questions.question: Which 1990 film does this strange sounding quote come from?

options.text: The Hitch-Hikers Guide to the Galaxy

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Total Recall

questions.question: In the movie Blazing Saddles, before becoming the first black sheriff in town, Bart met a drunk in the cells that became his ally. What name was this man better known by?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Waco Kid

questions.question: Which film can you hear this chilling quote in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Matrix

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and American Pie

questions.question: Which character from the movie American Pie joins the choir in hopes of meeting a girl?

questions.question: What is the name of the high school in the movie American Pie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: East Great Falls High

questions.question: For which of the movies listed below did Steven Spielberg win Oscars for Best Director?

options.text: Schindlers List and The Color Purple
Schindlers List and Saving Private Ryan
Empire of the Sun and Schindlers List

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Schindlers List and Saving Private Ryan

questions.question: What was Steven Spielbergs debut theatrical feature film?

options.text: Close Encounters of the Third Kind

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Sugarland Express

questions.question: Which one of these Spielberg movies was not released in the 1980s?

options.text: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1941

questions.question: Steven Spielberg co-produced the cartoon Pinky and the Brain.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Where did the alien ship land at the end of the movie Close Encounters of the Third Kind?

questions.question: In which of these cities did Steven Spielberg NOT live as a child?

questions.question: Which film does the following quote come from?

options.text: Star Wars V: The Empire Strikes Back
Star Wars II: Attack of the Clones
Caravan of Courage: An Ewok Adventure

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: THX 1138

questions.question: The four main characters in the movie American Pie vowed to lose their virginity before what major event in their lives?

questions.question: What is the name of the Barenaked Ladies song that is played in the movie American Pie?

options.text: If I Had a Million Dollars

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: One Week

questions.question: What is the name of the restaurant that the friends frequent in the movie American Pie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dog Years

questions.question: Which character in the movie American Pie started her stories with this one time at band camp?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michele

questions.question: Which of these is not one of the nicknames of the characters in the movie American Pie?
